description:
The temperatures are dropping, and snow may be falling, but you're still out running. This weather-resistant and insulated running vest is purpose built to keep you going during the less-reliable months. Made from lightweight and sustainable materials, it packs a lot of warmth with a minimal footprint.

  • Recycled polyester ripstop WindWall™ fabric stops chilly wind in its tracks
  • Gridded recycled poly blend fleece locks in body heat and wicks away moisture
  • PFC-free DWR finish lets you shake off light rain and trail muck
  • Heatseeker™ Eco insulation is composed of 70% post-consumer recycled material
  • On-seam pockets keep your hands warms while waiting at crosswalks
  • Reflective logo improves visibility in low light
  • Trim athletic fit lies close to your body
name: The North Face Winter Warm Pro Vest - Men's
